General.Name: Qiming Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Qiming Information Technology Co.,Ltd provides products and services in the areas of smart manufacturing, smart cars, and smart cities in China. The company's management software products include ERP, intelligent manufacturing, smart logistics, collaborative office, market consulting service, and industrial Internet platform, as well as management software services. Qiming Information Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Changchun, China.
General.Address: Jingyue High-tech Ind. Dev Zn, Changchun, China, 130117
